title: Contributor 1.5.1 vss
search_text:
Contributor 1.5.1 vssChanges:

> 1. reviese #2374 
> 2. Support multi column summation
> 3. Delete unused functions and variables
> 4. Re adding Lagrange correlation function
> 5. add testsuite


missing explanation on input parametersneed_verify never used, there is no verification step in algorithmunused string format argumentModule parameter should have similar name to corresponding modulemaybe change the return type to boolean to make this api more friendly.Consider raise error in module with a clearer error message instead of inside protocol processthis part gives a numpy array, while select_data_by_idx gives a list. In general, we use numpy array to allow fast math operation.convoluted way of counting share amount, consider use *(x+1) in vss computation, and use the real value of needed share_amount.We follow CamelCase convention for class naming. Suggested name: VerifiableSecretSharing. always use join for joining tables of the same idbetter to use utility function from federatedml/util/data_io.py; schema content is checked inside this function lack check against invalid value: negative int, max limit etc.dsl/v1 & dsl/v2 & pipeline exemples should contain exactly the same examples: they should all use the same data sets and set up the same job workflowhere should be "data"; this document is on how to access input & output of pipeline components

title: Merge 1.4.2's update into master branch
search_text:
Merge 1.4.2's update into master branchFixes  ISSUE  #1461 #1464 #1465 #1466 #1467 #1476 #1525 #1530

Changes:

FederatedML
1 Optimize performance of Pearson which increases efficiency by more than twice.
2 Optimize Min-test module: Add secure-boost as optional test task. Set partyid and work_mode as input parameters. Use pre-import data set as input so that improved test process.
3 Support tok_k iv filter in feature selection module.
4 Support filling missing value for tag:value format data in DataIO.
5 Fix bug of lacking one layer of depth of tree in HeteroSecureBoost and support automatically alignment header of input data in predict process
6 Standardize the naming of example data set and add a data pre-import script.

FATE-Flow
1 Distinguish between user stop job and system stop job;
2 Optimized some logs;
3 Optimize zookeeper configuration
4 The model supports persistent storage to mysql
5 Push the model to the online service to support the specified storage address (local file and FATEFlowServer interface)

label: ['bug', 'enhancement', 'arch', 'deployment', 'federatedml', 'document', 'federation', 'fate-flow', 'deploy', 'examples']
title: Develop
search_text:
DevelopFixes  ISSUE  #935 #943 #973 #981 #998 #1086 #1089 #1092 #1096 #1097 #1106 #1122 #1126 #1130 #1131 #1132 #1133 #1134 #1155 #1169 #1175 #1176 #1177   #1179 #1184  #1198 #1236 

Changes:

Major Features and Improvements
FederatedML

Support Homo Secureboost
Support AIC/BIC-based Stepwise for Linear Models
Add Hetero Optimal Feature Binning, support iv/gini/chi-square/ks,and allow asymmetric binning methods
Interoperate with AI ecosystem: Add pytorch backend for Homo NN
Homo Framework factorization, simplify developing homo algorithms
Early stopping strategy for hetero algorithms.
Local Baseline supports multi-class classification
Add consistency check to Predict function
Optimize validation strategy，3x speed up in-training validation
FATE-Flow

Refactoring model management, native file directory storage, storage structure is more flexible, more information
Support model import and export, store and restore with reliable distributed system(Redis is currently supported)
Using MySQL instead of Redis to implement Job Queue, reducing system complexity
Support for uploading client local files
Automatically detects the existence of the table and provides the destroy option
Separate system, algorithm, scheduling command log, scheduling command log can be independently audited
Eggroll

Stability Boosts:

New resource management components introduce the brand new session mechanism. Processors can be cleaned up with a simple method call, even the session goes wrong.
Removes storage service. No C++ / native library compilation is needed.
Federated learning algorithms can still work at a 28% packet loss rate.
Performance Boosts:

Performances of federated learning algorithms are improved on Eggroll 2. Some algorithms get 10x performance boost.
Join interface is 16x faster than pyspark under federated learning scenarios.
User Experiences Boosts:

Quick deployment. Maven, pip, config and start.
Light dependencies. Check our requirements.txt / pom.xml and see.
Easy debugging. Necessary running contexts are provided. Runtime status are kept in log files and databases.
Few daemon processes. And they are all JVM applications.

label: ['bug', 'enhancement', 'arch', 'deployment', 'federatedml', 'document', 'fate-flow', 'federatedrec']
title: Merge deveop-1.3's dev content to master
search_text:
Merge deveop-1.3's dev content to masterFixes  ISSUE #790 #893 #950 #952 #956 #991 #992 #999 #1004 #1009 #958 #959 #961 #976 #988 #1006 #1017 #1019  #1029 #1041 #1044 #1046 #1047  #1050  #1053 #1060 #1063 

Changes:

FederatedREC
1 Add federated recommendation submodule
2 Add heterogeneous Factoraization Machine
3 Add hemogeneous Factoraization Machine
4 Add heterogeneous Matrix Factorization
5 Add heterogeneous Singular Value Decomposition
6 Add heterogeneous SVD++ (Factorization Meets the Neighborhood)
7 Add heterogeneous Generalized Matrix Factorization

FederatedML
1 Support Sparse data training in heterogeneous General Linear Model(Hetero-LR、Hetero-LinR、Hetero-PoissonR)
2 Fix 32M limitation of quantile binning to support higher feature dimension
3 Fix 32M limitation of histogram statistics for  SecureBoost to support higher feature dimension training.
4 Add abnormal parameters and input data detection in OneHot Encoder
5 fix not passing validate data to fit process to support evaluate validation data during training process
6. fix some other bug

Fate-Flow
1 Add clean job CLI for cleaning output and intermediate results, including data, metrics and sessions
2 Support for obtaining table namespace and name of output data via CLI
8 Fix KillJob unsuccessful execution in some special cases
3 Improve log system, add more exception and run time status prompts

title: Fix invalid image references.
search_text:
Fix invalid image references.Changes:
 Fixed invalid image reference error. 
 In addition, keep the naming style of the image file consistent with the others.

label: ['bug']
title: fix federation crash bug
search_text:
fix federation crash bugFixes  ISSUE#207

Changes:

1.  there is a single loop thread in the class arch/driver/federation/src/main/java/com/webank/ai/fate/driver/federation/transfer/communication/TransferJobScheduler.java,   if the pressure is high ,  the single thread can not get thread from threadpool ,so it will throw exception ,then this thread will exit。so there is no thread to handle request 
2.arch/driver/federation/src/main/java/com/webank/ai/fate/driver/federation/transfer/communication/processor/SendProcessor.java
there  are  producer  and  consumer in this class，  but the order of  initialization  is  wrong ，
the  consumer  should  before  producer，because  the consumer sometimes will  initialize failed  under high pressure,  the producor will block  in that case，so  the thread in the threadpool will use up
